abstract: The bank believes it can raise funds to satisfy regulators through asset sales and a big stock conversion plan.
snippet: The bank believes it can raise funds to satisfy regulators through asset sales and a big stock conversion plan.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is locked in negotiations with federal regulators over whether it needs to raise as much as $10 billion in fresh capital as a result of the government’s stress test of its financial health, according to a person briefed on the situation.

headline.main: Citi Is Said to Require New Capital
headline.print_headline: Citi Is Said To Require New Capital
